title: fMRI Equipment Troubleshooting
text:
Created by Chad Smiddy, last modified by Pierce, Elizabeth on Jan 02, 2024

**_Video_**

 **Problem**: The NNL Screen is not turning on when connecting to the stim computer or your laptop.

 **Solution**: Make sure its power source in the Conditional MRI Area is glowing green.

 **Problem**: The NNL Screen turns on but then goes dark.

**Solution**: The NNL v2.1 adapter may be needed to match your higher resolution.

**Solution**: The HDMI cable's power source via USB from the Pure Link connector might need to be plugged in.

**Problem**: The NNL Screen is not turning on when connecting to the stim computer or laptop.

**Solution**: Make sure its power source in the Conditional MRI Area is glowing green.

**_Audio_**

**Problem**: No sound is coming through any of the MRI compatible headphones or earphones from the NIC stim computer or project laptop.

**Solution**: Check that the blue audio cable coming from any of the head/ear/phones talk boxes is connected to the stim computer via its green port or project laptop.

**Problem**: No sound is coming through the Siemens headphones.

**Solution**: Check that the blue audio cable coming from the stim computer is connected to the black booster cable coming from the Siemens talk box.

Anubix2 Image Transfer

**Problem**: Images are not appearing on Anubix2 after the transfer has been initiated.

**Solution**: Make sure either Horos or OsiriX is running, not both launched, then restart the transfer from the Prisma.
